name: nanbi2d
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wb(wnan(w1, w2), wnan(w1, w3)), wb(w2, w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wnan(w1, w2), wnan(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w3))
-| wi(wb(w2, w3), wb(wnan(w1, w2), wnan(w1, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wnan(w1, w2), wnan(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w3))
-| wi(wb(w2, w3), wb(wnan(w1, w2), wnan(w1, w3)))

body.origin: |- wi(wb(w2, w3), wb(wnan(w1, w2), wnan(w1, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wnan(w1, w2), wnan(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w3))

comment: Introduce a left anti-conjunct to both sides of a logical equivalence. (Contributed by SF, 2-Jan-2018.)
